summary: REQ-9 segmented circumference progress timing appears updated to fill exactly one segment per 8 seconds via totalSegments = ceil(totalDurationSeconds/8) and filledSegments = min(floor(elapsedSeconds/8), totalSegments). However, the diff also includes unrelated modifications to repository metadata/summary files that were not requested as part of the frontend-only timing fix.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrelated updates to repository metadata/summary files (not part of the segmented circumference timing/fill behavior change).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constrains the change to only the segmented circumference progress timing/fill fix; modifications to project summary/state files are not requested or necessary to implement REQ-9.
